name: The Bad Art Dimension
description:
Welcome to the Bad Art Dimension!

Somehow, you are now on a dimension with bad art and you are transforming into a stickman, but don't worry, Tin and Chachi will help you!

Controls
  • Use the space bar, enter key or the left click to play.
Credits
  • Background music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com
  • Dialogic addon by @emi_cpl
